subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Michael Albasini of Switzerland, riding for GreenEdge, won the Tour of Catalonia by 1 minute 30 seconds over Samuel Sanchez, a Spaniard riding for Euskaltel.
snippet: Michael Albasini of Switzerland, riding for GreenEdge, won the Tour of Catalonia by 1 minute 30 seconds over Samuel Sanchez, a Spaniard riding for Euskaltel.
